title: Enable removing language code from the Dev Center "language history"
body: Please enable removing language code from the Dev Center "language history"

comments.body: What is the current state of this issue? Will it be ever considered to solve?

@Cliff Interesting to see that the ADMIN has same problem as the Daily-Windows-store-Publisher :)
By the way, what is the current state of this issue?
Side note that the same issue happens with en-us and en (international English), which has bit me a couple times.

I'm in a situation where I published an update of my app for WP8.1 with Norwegian language support for the first time. The app crashes on startup every time, and I suspect the problem is related to missing resource assemblies for Norwegian.
Please enable removing language code from the Dev Center "language history"
I believe the issue is related to mine, the symptoms are not the same but somehow root cause might be the same:
